Bullet Point 1: Standard widths 12" to 18" and heights 24" to 106" or fully custom shutters available
Bullet Point 2: EnduraCore is a high-density composite material that is immune to the natural elements like heat, cold, water, and more
Bullet Point 3: Shutters will not expand, contract, rot, or warp and come with a lifetime warranty
Bullet Point 4: With over 30 shutter designs, both traditional and modern, there is an EnduraCore shutter no matter your home's style
Bullet Point 5: Don’t see the exact style you want? We can do custom! Contact us today
Product Description: Enhance your home with EnduraCore Shutters, combining elegance with resilience. Over 30 styles and 25 colors to choose from, catering to every aesthetic. Effortless functional or decorative installation for a quick, stunning transformation. EnduraCore composite is immune to the natural elements and will last forever. With an appealing price point, quick lead times, unlimited size, design, and color combinations, and able to be installed both functionally or decoratively, there’s sure to be the perfect EnduraCore shutter for you.
